name: en-usb
title: Read USB Stick/Drive if inserted
description: Teachers/Librarians: your class handouts (PDF files, photos, public notices, etc) will instantly appear Right Here after you insert a USB stick/drive into the Internet-in-a-Box.
extra_description: Finally: don't hesitate to physically remove your USB stick at any time, after Wi-Fi users have downloaded what they need from you.
